author: Staff Reporter
text:
Special gram sabha meetings will be held in all the 95 village panchayats in the district to discuss enumeration of houses without toilets and vaccination of cattle for foot and mouth disease on February 26.

The houses left out in the 1993 enumeration conducted by the health department and newly built houses without toilets would be enumerated afresh and the list should be submitted at the meeting.

If such families have any claims and objections, they should be recorded and according to that new list, toilets should be recommended.

Besides these, the people should be informed about the vaccination exercise for cattle to be undertaken by the Department of Animal Husbandry at the meeting.

The meeting should be convened at a public place, where the people would congregate in large numbers at 11 a.m. said Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan.
title: Special gram sabha meetings
